post:
We have just launched spotillo to public.

Create unlimited timelines about life, holidays, groups, locations, business, blogs, networking and let people join your timeline.

Timelines can be private or public, one account can have unlimited timelines.

For all LowEndTalk users I offer one timeline free of ads for life.

Use it to promote your business, share your passion or just start creating a great group like this one: http://www.spotillo.com/tl/8/es/kitesurf-spot-guide

Register and create your timeline, whenever you ready post it here and I make it ad free for life.

http://www.spotillo.com

Cheers
Jérôme
